item.description:

c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.flushOutStream();
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“TEXT”, 8144);

item.title: [pi] Adding ::commands and ::rules
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { c.sendMessage("Player Commands"); c.sendMessage("::master"); c.sendMessage("::home"); c.sendMessage("::vengrunes"); c.sendMessage("::barragerunes"); }
Close enough? or you could have it as

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { c.sendMessage("Currently, player commands are:"); c.sendMessage("::master, ::home, ::vengrunes, ::barragerunes"); }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Adding ::commands and ::rules

item.description:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dgr@Commands", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@bla@Player Commands", 8145); sendQuest("@bla@::master", 8147); sendQuest("@bla@::home", 8148); sendQuest("@bla@::home", 8149); sendQuest("@bla@::vengrunes", 8150); sendQuest("@bla@::barragerunes", 8151); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
